SELECT /* menuManageDAO.selectMenuManageListTotCnt_S */ COUNT(MENU_NO) AS totcnt FROM LETTNMENUINFO WHERE binary(MENU_NM) like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT /* menuManageDAO.selectMenuManage_D */ MENU_NO AS menuNo , MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , MENU_NM AS menuNm , UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , MENU_DC AS menuDc , PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm , USE_YN FROM LETTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO = #{searchKeyword}
